cells.data:
• Html - content
  • css - style
  • Layout is the combination
CSS
  • rule - one curly bracket
  • Declaration - border: 1px solid red;
  • selector - the element we’re changing
  • property - border
  • Value - 1px solid red
Selectors 
  • tag
  • Class - .bn
  • Id - #upload
  • Attribute
  • Pseudo-element - ::after
  • Pseudo-class - :hover
Combinators
  • descendent - whitespace
  • Child >
  • next sibling +
  • later sibling ~
  • Tag.class - both tag and the class
  • Tag .class - has .class that is a child of tag
  • Tag,.class - with either tag or class
  • tag+.class - .class whose left sibling match tag
Conflicts
  • Inline attribute like style=“background: orange;” wins over id and class
  • !important wins over inline

Responsive Design
  • chrome dev tools
    • allows you to shrink size and test
  • Flex box
    • Module that provides a way to lay out site when not know size or it’s always changing
    • caniuse.com
